faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Shop Studio
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.question: What exactly is Shop Studio and how does it work?
items.answer: Shop Studio is an all-in-one e-commerce management platform designed for multi-platform sellers. It connects your Amazon, Ozon, Shopee and other stores, providing centralized order management, inventory synchronization, and powerful analytics - all in one place.

items.question: Do I need technical skills to use Shop Studio?
items.answer: Not at all! Shop Studio is designed to be user-friendly for merchants of all technical levels. Our intuitive interface and comprehensive documentation make it easy to get started, even if you're not tech-savvy.

items.question: Which e-commerce platforms does Shop Studio support?
items.answer: Shop Studio supports all major e-commerce platforms including Amazon, Ozon, Shopee, and more. We're constantly adding new integrations based on merchant needs.

items.question: How long does it take to set up Shop Studio?
items.answer: Most merchants are fully set up and running within a few hours. Simply connect your stores, configure your settings, and start managing your multi-platform operations immediately.

items.question: Is my data secure with Shop Studio?
items.answer: Absolutely. Shop Studio uses enterprise-grade security with encrypted connections to all platforms. We never store your credentials and comply with all major e-commerce security standards.

items.question: Can I customize Shop Studio for my business needs?
items.answer: Yes! Shop Studio offers flexible configuration options. You can customize workflows, automation rules, and reporting to match your specific business requirements while maintaining a simple, powerful interface.
